Improvements.Improvement: Extract repetitive code to a method
Improvements.Description: The creation of ApiResponse is happening multiple times with minor differences. This repetitive code can be extracted to a separate method, which can accept parameters to customize the ApiResponse.

Improvements.Improvement: Use method reference instead of lambda
Improvements.Description: In Java 8 and later, you can use method references instead of lambdas when the lambda's body calls a method directly.
